Tech Cost Scaling
No Scaling
The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will not be scaled, and will only be affected by the Base Tech Cost set above.
Low Era Scaling

The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will be slightly scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Tech Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 110%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 115%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 125%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 130%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 138%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 145%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 150%
Moderate Era Scaling

The [ICON_SCIENCE] Science cost of technologies will be moderately scaled by era, after being multiplied by the Base Tech Cost set above.[NEWLINE]Classical Era: 110%[NEWLINE]Medieval Era: 120%[NEWLINE]Renaissance Era: 135%[NEWLINE]Industrial Era: 145%[NEWLINE]Modern Era: 158%[NEWLINE]Atomic Era: 170%[NEWLINE]Information Era: 180%[NEWLINE]Future Era: 190%
